name: ISOLA
type: Verdicchio dei Castelli di Jesi DOP

vinification.label: Vinification and wine aging
vinification.data: The bunch of grapes gets softly and quickly pressed what permits to obtain 40% of must. The fermentation occurs at controlled temperature of 16°C. The wine againg in steel basins lasts 14 months. It takes place on noble wine lees which are mixed up with periodical batonnage.

name: OPERE
type: Verdicchio dei Castelli di Jesi DOP

vinification.label: Vinification and wine aging
vinification.data: The fermentation occurs at controlled temperature of 16°C. The wine againg in stainless steel tanl lasts 4 months and it is made on noble wine lees which are mixed up with periodical batonnage.

vinification.label: Vinification and wine aging
vinification.data: The bunch of grapes gets softly and quickly pressed what permits to obtain 40% of must. The fermentation occurs at controlled temperature of 16°C. The wine aging in steel basins lasts 5 months. It takes place on noble wine lees which are mixed up with periodical batonnage.

grape.label: Grape
grape.data: Merlot, Cabernet Sauvignon, Montepulciano (the grape percentage depends on the yearly grape harvest)

vinification.label: Vinification and wine aging
vinification.data: The fermentation of destemmed grapes occurs at controlled temperature of 25°C and a soaking period of 30 days. The wine ages in barrique for about 12 months and afterwards in bottles for 6 months.

vinification.label: Vinification and wine aging
vinification.data: The fermentation of destemmed grapes occurs at controlled temperature of 24°C and a soaking period of 30 days. The wine ages for about 4 months in stainless steel tank and afterward in bottle for 2 months.

name: APOLLONIA
type: Verdicchio dei Castelli di Jesi DOP, Metodo Classico Brut Nature

vinification.label: Vinification and wine aging
vinification.data: The bunch of grape is soflty and quickly pressed. It permits to obtain 40% of must. The fermentation occurs at controlled temperature of 16°C and the tirage occurs in the following year. The wine takes place on the noble wine lees at the least 40 months and it is sold 6 months after the degorgement.

name: CONTATTO
type: Verdicchio dei Castelli di Jesi DOP, Metodo Classico Brut

vinification.label: Vinification and wine aging
vinification.data: The bunch of grape is soflty and quickly pressed. It permits to obtain 40% of must. The fermentation occurs at controlled temperature of 16°C and the tirage occurs in the following year. The wine takes place on the noble wine lees at the least 40 months and it is sold 6 months after the degorgement with the addition of liqueur d’expedition.

name: EXTRA BRUT ROSÉ
type: Marche IGP Rosato, Spumante di Qualità, Metodo Classico Extra Brut

harvest.label: Grape harvest period
harvest.data: Last ten days of August for Verdicchio, first ten days of October for Montepulciano.

vinification.label: Vinification and wine aging
vinification.data: Vinification and wine aging Rosé is obtained from the separate vinification of Verdicchio and Montepulciano grapes. Verdicchio grapes are vinified with the traditional-method of sparkling wine. Montepulciano grapes follow the traditional red wine vinification; as soon as the grapes are pickled, the selected bunches are transported over the vats for the 24 hours cold maceration and then fermentation. After about 7 months of maturation, the wine is carried out and bottled for the slow fermentation that lasts 36 months. The bottle-fermentation over the lees is followed by the disgorge. Rosè wine will be stored in the cellar for 4 months.

name: CAMPO DI CUORI
type: Vino Bianco Spumante di qualità, Metodo Classico Extra Brut

vinification.label: Vinification and wine aging
vinification.data: Vinification and wine aging The bunch of grape is soflty and quickly pressed. It permits to obtain 40% of must. The fermentation occurs at controlled temperature of 16°C and the tirage occurs in the following year. The wine takes place on the noble wine lees at the least 36 months and it is sold 6 months after the degorgement.

vinification.label: Vinification and wine aging
vinification.data: The fermentation of the destemmed grapes takes place at a temperature of 23°C and a maceration period of about 20 days. The wine ages for about 4 months in stainless steel tanks with a subsequent refinement in the bottle for 2 months.

vinification.label: Vinification and wine aging
vinification.data: The Valdobbiadene Prosecco superiore DOCG Millesimato is a white sparkling wine made from the best selected grapes harvested in a year. These have been hand-picked from the highest hills where the sun light gives to the Prosecco grape the best ripeness, an intense aroma and a superior preservation of the organoleptic properties. This blend produces a fresh and round wine, with elegant flair, suitable for the best occasions. The colour is a straw-yellow. Recommended serving temperature: (8°C).
